column4: having a problem with google images for some reason the thumnails wont show up, ive cleared the browser cache but stil nothing
is this only with that one browser (firefox i presume)

have you tried any other browser (ie. chromium, opera, etc.)? (btw, it makes it easier if you tag your lines here with the username of the person ur talking to... ie. jus type in ad , and then hit tab)
or in my case.. adal and then tab
yeah ive tried both them browsers but when it comes to google images none of the thumnails load
right... hmm.. are all the other pictures loading fine?
yeah in other sites and stuff, pictures load up perfect, in google images the thumnails just arnt loading, it's weird
that is weird, maybe it's to do with your local google server, try searching with google.co.in, or google.co.uk instead, and see if things improve
adalal strange thing is it seems to be just my pc other computers in the house are working fine
some sort of issue with caching :S.. u said u cleared your caches?
yep , several times in all browsers
do you have any parental controls setup? or something to do with your dns server?
no, :S ill have a mess around with network settings and the router hopefully that will sort it
try using a different internet dns server
